verses.verse: A Plea for Justice A Psalm of Asaph. [1] God ((2 Chr. 19:6; Eccl. 5:8)) stands in the congregation of the mighty; He judges among (Ps. 82:6) the gods.
How long will you judge unjustly, And ((Deut. 1:17); Prov. 18:5) show partiality to the wicked? Selah
Defend the poor and fatherless; Do justice to the afflicted and ((Deut. 24:17; Is. 11:4; Jer. 22:16)) needy.
Deliver the poor and needy; Free them from the hand of the wicked.
They do not know, nor do they understand; They walk about in darkness; All the (Ps. 11:3) foundations of the earth are unstable.
I said, (John 10:34) “You are gods, And all of you are children of the Most High.
But you shall die like men, And fall like one of the princes.”
Arise, O God, judge the earth; (Ps. 2:8; (Rev. 11:15)) For You shall inherit all nations.
